Property.name: animateTarget
Property.comment: Id or element from which the dialog should animate while opening

Property.name: autoCreate
Property.comment: True to auto create from scratch, or using a DomHelper Object (defaults to false)

Property.name: autoScroll
Property.comment: True to allow the dialog body contents to overflow and display scrollbars (defaults to false)

Property.name: autoTabs
Property.comment: If true, all elements with class 'x-dlg-tab' will get automatically converted to tabs (defaults to false)

Property.name: buttonAlign
Property.comment: Valid values are 'left,' 'center' and 'right' (defaults to 'right')

Property.name: closable
Property.comment: False to remove the built-in top-right corner close button (defaults to true)

Property.name: collapsible
Property.comment: False to remove the built-in top-right corner collapse button (defaults to true)

Property.name: constraintoviewport
Property.comment: True to keep the dialog constrained within the visible viewport boundaries (defaults to true)

Property.name: draggable
Property.comment: False to disable dragging of the dialog within the viewport (defaults to true)

Property.name: fixedcenter
Property.comment: True to ensure that anytime the dialog is shown or resized it gets centered (defaults to false)

Property.name: handles
Property.type: String} resizeHandles Which resize handles to display - see the {@link Ext.Resizable
Property.comment: config

Property.name: height
Property.comment: Height of the dialog in pixels (can also be set via CSS). Determined by browser if unspecified.

Property.name: minButtonWidth
Property.comment: Minimum width of all dialog buttons (defaults to 75)

Property.name: minHeight
Property.comment: The minimum allowable height for a resizable dialog (defaults to 80)

Property.name: minWidth
Property.comment: The minimum allowable width for a resizable dialog (defaults to 200)

Property.name: modal
Property.comment: True to show the dialog modally, preventing user interaction with the rest of the page (defaults to false)

Property.name: proxyDrag
Property.comment: True to drag a lightweight proxy element rather than the dialog itself, used when

Property.name: resizable
Property.comment: False to disable manual dialog resizing (defaults to true)

Property.name: shadow
Property.comment: True or 'sides' for the default effect, 'frame' for 4-way shadow, and 'drop' for bottom-right

Property.name: shadowOffset
Property.comment: The number of pixels to offset the shadow if displayed (defaults to 5)

Property.name: shim
Property.comment: True to create an iframe shim that prevents selects from showing through (defaults to false)

Property.name: syncHeightBeforeShow
Property.comment: True to cause the dimensions to be recalculated before the dialog is shown (defaults to false)

Property.name: tabTag
Property.comment: The tag name of tab elements, used when autoTabs = true (defaults to 'div')

Property.name: title
Property.comment: Default text to display in the title bar (defaults to null)

Property.name: width
Property.comment: Width of the dialog in pixels (can also be set via CSS). Determined by browser if unspecified.

Property.name: x
Property.comment: The default left page coordinate of the dialog (defaults to center screen)

Property.name: y
Property.comment: The default top page coordinate of the dialog (defaults to center screen)

Event.name: beforehide
Event.comment: Fires before this dialog is hidden.

Event.name: beforeshow
Event.comment: Fires before this dialog is shown.

Event.name: hide
Event.comment: Fires when this dialog is hidden.

Event.name: keydown
Event.comment: Fires when a key is pressed

Event.name: move
Event.comment: Fires when this dialog is moved by the user.

Event.name: resize
Event.comment: Fires when this dialog is resized by the user.

Event.name: show
Event.comment: Fires when this dialog is shown.
